name: SwordCatcher
description:
This is a mobile game that I'm working on. Tap the sword when it hits the black bar to catch it! This is a very early build that I hope to improve and expand upon in the future. The idea is eventually to have different themed worlds and fights, with more interesting mechanics than just a sword falling.

Thanks for checking out my stuff!

P.S: Eventually releasing on the google play store is the aim, the PC build is just for ease of people trying it out
